Description.Text: The Harbour's leisure facilities are second to none, notably including the exclusive spa brand, Timeless Spa which offers a range of treatments for men and women using natural and indigenous ingredients. Complimentary beach access is offered at the nearby Le Royal Meridien Beach Resort & Spa and guests will be shuttled by hotel on a complimentary basis. Guests also have access to the Gymnasium and outdoor swimming pool. There is a business centre, meeting room and secretarial and PA services on request. (SD 07/08)

The Harbour Hotel, owned by the world famous Emirates Group, is located in the prestigious Dubai Marina Development and commands staggering views of the Palm Island and across the blue waters of the Arabian Gulf. It is a short walk away from Dubai's prime commercial estate - Dubai Internet City and Dubai Media City. It is also conveniently located to access the Jebel Ali Free Zone and only 40 minutes from Dubai International Airport. The Mall of The Emirates and Ibn Battuta Mall Shopping Malls are within 10 minutes of the hotel and the Emirates Golf Club is a mere 5 minutes by car.

The Sea View three-bedroom suite features balconies overlooking the stunning Marina development. Ideal for families, the floor space is over 220 square metres and have spacious living and dining areas with balcony access. They also have fully-equipped state-of-the-art kitchenette, which includes crockery, cutlery, and cooking utensils, washer/dryer, dishwasher, fridge, kettle, coffee maker, iron and ironing board. The Master bedroom has a king size bed and the second & third bedrooms have twin bed, all are ensuite. Also included is a 42 inch LCD TV, DVD player with surround sound, balcony, international satellite tv channels, high speed internet access and an ipod docking station.
Modern high rise building in keeping with the many towers around the Marina.
The hotels has a signature penthouse restaurant which has panoramic vistas of the Palm Jumeirah and Dubai Marina. There is also a mediterranean restaurant, room service and 24 hour coffee shop.
Comfortable lobby with the main reception on the right hand side as you enter. A small seating is located near to the reception around the corner.
